# [Interview #1051: AMOL Signing Report - NutiketAiel, Entry #29](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1051#29)

#### NutiketAiel

One fan asked for something about the "two sentences" that Robert Jordan left about the planned outrigger novels.

#### Brandon Sanderson

Brandon said that the sentences would be released at some point, but did say that one of them was about â€œwhat Perrin's doing."
